data_table.description: The dataset represents variables used to collect annual information about e.g. diabetes management, adherence to treatment plan, diabetes-related complications, usage of (non-diabetes) medications, general physical and lifestyle measurements (e.g. height, weight, smoking, exercise), medical history, and socio-economic information (used through September '90).

variable.name: FSASDATE
variable.description: Form date as SAS date value

variable.name: FORM
variable.description: DCCT form number

variable.name: OCLSTVST
variable.description: Date of last completed visit

variable.name: OCMRDATE
variable.description: Date marital status changed

variable.name: OCSMOKE8

variable.name: OCEXER5
variable.description: Exercise: hours and minutes of very hard activity

variable.name: OCF2
variable.description: Total number of clinic visits

variable.description: Patient consumed at least one alcoholic beverage per week during last 12 months

variable.name: OCDRINK6
variable.description: Total amount of alcohol consumed in last 7 days > 560 grams

variable.name: OCI3
variable.description: Standard treatment: performs self blood glucose monitoring

variable.description: Standard treatment: performs urine glucose monitoring

variable.name: OCJ1A
variable.description: How often has patient claimed to follow meal plan?

variable.name: OCJ1B
variable.description: Patient has an eating disorder

variable.name: OCJ1CI
variable.description: How many illnesses did patient experience?

variable.name: OCJ1CII
variable.description: How often (during illnesses) did patient fail to adjust the insulin dose as prescribed?

variable.name: OCJ1D
variable.description: Patient used a type of insulin not prescribed

variable.name: OCJ1E
variable.description: Patient has rotated injection site

variable.name: OCJ1F
variable.description: Patient has completed less than 7 blood collections

variable.name: OCJ1GI
variable.description: Number of intercurrent events experienced

variable.name: OCJ1GII
variable.description: Number of intercurrent events patient failed to report

variable.name: OCJ1H
variable.description: Patient failed to bring in daily record

variable.name: OCJ1II
variable.description: Patient performs self blood glucose monitoring

variable.name: OCJ1III
variable.description: Patient uses self blood glucose monitoring to adjust insulin dosage

variable.name: OCJ1IIII
variable.description: Patient performs self blood glucose monitoring more than once a day

variable.name: OCJ2A
variable.description: Standard treatment group: number of days patient has taken more insulin than prescribed

variable.name: OCJ2B
variable.description: Standard treatment group: number of days patient used additional injections of insulin

variable.name: OCJ2C
variable.description: Standard treatment group: number of days patient has taken fewer injections of insulin

variable.name: OCJ2D
variable.description: Standard treatment group: number of days patient failed to take prescribed insulin

variable.name: OCJ2E
variable.description: Standard treatment group: number of days patient failed to perform two urine and one blood test

variable.name: OCJ2FI
variable.description: Standard treatment group: number of days patient has been ill

variable.name: OCJ2FII
variable.description: Standard treatment group: number of days patient failed to test/record urine acetone during illness

variable.name: OCJ3A
variable.description: Experimental treatment group: number of days patient did not follow prescribed algorithm for insulin delivery

variable.name: OCJ3B
variable.description: Experimental treatment group: number of times patient failed to administer prescribed 3 A.M. blood test

variable.name: OCJ3C
variable.description: Experimental treatment group: number of times patient failed to report low 3 A.M. blood glucose

variable.name: OCJ3D
variable.description: Experimental treatment group: number of times patient failed to monitor urine acetone when blood glucose was >240mg/dl or during illness

variable.name: OCJ4A
variable.description: Infusion pump (experimental treatment group): number of times patient failed to change infusion pump batteries

variable.name: OCJ4B
variable.description: Infusion pump (experimental treatment group): number of times patient failed to change catheters

variable.name: OCJ4C
variable.description: Infusion pump (experimental treatment group): number of times patient failed to change syringes

variable.name: OCK1A
variable.description: Hyperglycemia: number of nights patient woke up once to urinate

variable.name: OCK1B
variable.description: Hyperglycemia: number of nights patient woke up two or more times to urinate

variable.name: OCK1C
variable.description: Hyperglycemia: number of 8-oz glasses of fluid drunken per day

variable.name: OCK1D
variable.description: Hyperglycemia: number of times patient experienced diabetic ketoacidosis

variable.name: OCK1E
variable.description: Hyperglycemia: patient hade other symptoms of hyperglycemia

variable.name: OCK2
variable.description: On how many days did patient have moderate or large ketonuria?

variable.name: OCK2A
variable.description: Number of ketonuria events explained by change in routine

variable.name: OCK2B
variable.description: Number of ketonuria events due to illness

variable.name: OCK2C
variable.description: Number of ketonuria events due to medical equipment failure

variable.name: OCK2D
variable.description: Number of ketonuria events spontaneous or unexplained

variable.name: OCK3A
variable.description: Patient is female

variable.name: OCK3BI
variable.description: Patient experienced vaginal itching or discharge

variable.name: OCK3BII
variable.description: Patient has been treated for this (vaginal itching or discharge)

variable.name: OCK3CI
variable.description: Patient menstruates

variable.name: OCK3DI
variable.description: Menstrual period occurred more than 5 weeks ago

variable.name: OCK3DII
variable.description: Pregnancy test has been performed

variable.name: OCK3DIII
variable.description: Pregnancy test indicated pregnancy

variable.name: OCK4A
variable.description: Hypoglycemia: number of hospitalizations for hypoglycemia

variable.name: OCK4BI
variable.description: Severe hypoglycemia: how many times has patient experienced hypoglycemia severe enough to lose consciousness - without seizure occurrence

variable.name: OCK4BII
variable.description: Severe hypoglycemia: how many times has patient experienced hypoglycemia severe enough to lose consciousness - with seizure occurrence

variable.name: OCK4CI
variable.description: Severe hypoglycemia: how many times has patient needed i.v. or injection of glucose

variable.name: OCK4CII
variable.description: Severe hypoglycemia: how many times has patient required assistance with administration of glucagon

variable.name: OCK4CIII
variable.description: Severe hypoglycemia: how many times has patient needed assistance of another person (other than listed under questions ock4ci-4cii)

variable.name: OCK4DI
variable.description: When did severe hypoglycemia occur?

variable.name: OCK4DIIA
variable.description: Severe hypoglycemia - cause: missed meal or snack

variable.name: OCK4DIIB
variable.description: Severe hypoglycemia - cause: decreased food intake

variable.name: OCK4DIIC
variable.description: Severe hypoglycemia - cause: increased exercise level

variable.name: OCK4DIID
variable.description: Severe hypoglycemia - cause: too much insulin taken

variable.name: OCK4DIIE
variable.description: Severe hypoglycemia - cause: no warning signs of low blood glucose

variable.name: OCK4DIIF
variable.description: Severe hypoglycemia - cause: other

variable.name: OCK4DIIG
variable.description: Severe hypoglycemia - cause: unexplained

variable.name: OCK4DII1
variable.description: Severe hypoglycemia - symptoms: adrenergic warning symptoms

variable.name: OCK4DII2
variable.description: Severe hypoglycemia - symptoms: diaphoresis (sweating)

variable.name: OCK4DII3
variable.description: Severe hypoglycemia - symptoms: altered mental status

variable.name: OCT
variable.description: Standard Group - Since last visit - if no modification(s) in therapy, check/proceed to end of form

variable.name: OCTA
variable.description: Standard Group - Modification(s) since last visit: more frequent dietary instruction

variable.name: OCTA1
variable.description: Standard Group - Modification(s) since last visit: record total number of additional sessions (dietary instructions).

variable.name: OCTB
variable.description: Standard Group - Modification(s) since last visit: interim telephone contact

variable.name: OCTB1
variable.description: Standard Group - Modification(s) since last visit: record total number of telephone contacts

variable.name: OCTC
variable.description: Standard Group - Modification(s) since last visit: hospitalization for metabolic control

variable.name: OCTC1
variable.description: Standard Group - Modification(s) since last visit: record total number of hospitalizations for metabolic control

variable.name: OCTD
variable.description: Standard Group - Modification(s) since last visit: glucose monitoring at greater frequency then specified in protocol

variable.name: OCTD1
variable.description: Standard Group - Modification(s) since last visit: record frequency of self blood glucose monitoring/day

variable.name: OCTD2
variable.description: Standard Group - Modification(s) since last visit: record frequency of urine glucose monitoring/day

variable.name: OCTE
variable.description: Standard Group - Modification(s) since last visit: used more than two injections of insulin/day

variable.name: OCTE1
variable.description: Standard Group - Modification(s) since last visit: currently using more than two injections/day

variable.name: OCTF
variable.description: Standard Group - Modification(s) since last visit: other modification(s)

variable.name: OCU
variable.description: Experimental Group - If no modifications have been made, check and sign the form

variable.name: OCUA
variable.description: Experimental Group - Modification(s) since last visit: less frequent out-patient visits planned

variable.name: OCUA1
variable.description: Experimental Group - Modification(s) since last visit: record new frequency of visits

variable.name: OCUB
variable.description: Experimental Group - Modification(s) since last visit: discontinuation of self blood glucose monitoring

variable.name: OCUC
variable.description: Experimental Group - Modification(s) since last visit: self blood glucose monitoring on a less frequent daily schedule

variable.name: OCUC1
variable.description: Experimental Group - Modification(s) since last visit: record frequency of blood glucose monitoring/day

variable.name: OCUD
variable.description: Experimental Group - Modification(s) since last visit: institution of urine glucose monitoring

variable.name: OCUD1
variable.description: Experimental Group - Modification(s) since last visit: record frequency of urine glucose monitoring/day

variable.name: OCUE
variable.description: Less stringent therapy goals are planned

variable.name: OCUEIV
variable.description: Stated goals are in effect at present

variable.name: OCUF
